markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Erecura (Queen of Dis)](/Deities.aspx?ID=151)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Manipulate dangerous beings and opportunities to your benefit, thrive in hostile conditions, divine the future

**Anathema** Despoil nature, kill a natural plant or animal that has managed to thrive outside of its intended environment

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)

**Domains** [Fate](/Domains.aspx?ID=12), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=28), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31), [Truth](/Domains.aspx?ID=32)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Anticipate Peril](/Spells.aspx?ID=568)

- **2nd**
[Misdirection](/Spells.aspx?ID=198)

- **3rd**
[Nondetection](/Spells.aspx?ID=209)

</column>
name: Erecura (Queen of Dis)
